TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITextRangeProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，UI 自动化客户端可通过这些方法和属性访问用于实现 的文本容器中的一块连续文本。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to a span of continuous text in a text container that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必须支持控件模式的 UI 自动化提供程序上实现 。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 可以表示容器中的插入点、子集或所有文本 。A can represent an insertion point, a subset, or all of the text in a container.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

span.span: Server-side UI Automation Provider Implementation

related.span: 客户端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

span.span: Client-side UI Automation Provider Implementation

related.span: 在 UI 自动化提供程序中支持控件模式

span.span: Support Control Patterns in a UI Automation Provider

related.span: UI 自动化 TextPattern 概述

span.span: UI Automation TextPattern Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 添加到突出显示文本集合中，该集合位于支持多个不连续选择的文本容器中。

span.span: Adds to the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本插入点移动到新选择的区域。The text insertion point moves to the area of the new selection. 提供一个退化文本范围会移动插入点。Providing a degenerate text range moves the insertion point.

exception.span: 如果文本提供程序不支持选择多个不连续的文本范围（即， 的值必须为 ）。

span.span: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (that is, must have a value of ).

span.span: Returns a new identical to the original and inheriting all properties of the original.

returns.span: 新的文本范围。

span.span: The new text range.

returns.span: 从不返回空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以独立于原始范围操作新范围。The new range can be manipulated independently from the original.

span.span: Returns a value that specifies whether two text ranges have identical endpoints.

returns.span: 如果调用方的端点在文本中比目标端点先出现，则返回一个负值。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExpandToEnclosingUnit(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit) cil managed

param.name: unit
param.span: 文本单位。

span.span: The textual unit.

summary.span: 将文本范围扩展到指定的文本单位。

span.span: Expands the text range to the specified text unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果范围已是指定单位的精确数量，则它将保持不变。If the range is already an exact quantity of the specified units then it remains unchanged. 要使方法成功执行，幕后还会涉及到一系列步骤 。There is a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 对文本范围进行了规范化。也就是说，已在 终结点将文本范围折叠为退化范围，这使得 终结点成为多余。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 在文本范围跨越边界的情况下，此步骤是必需的 `unit` ; 例如，"{The U} RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) 嵌入文本"，其中 "{" 和 "}" 是文本范围的终结点。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 生成的范围在 中向后移动到所请求的 `unit` 边界的开头。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 范围在 中向前或向后移动所请求的 `unit` 边界的数目。The range is moved forward or backward in the by the requested number of `unit` boundaries. 4. 然后通过将 终结点移动一个所请求的 `unit` 边界，范围从退化范围状态扩展开来。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![范围调整（通过移动 & ExpandToEnclosingUnit）](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "通过 Move 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit 进行的范围调整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何针对 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 调整文本范围的示例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() > [!NOTE] > 这些步骤是必需的，因为屏幕阅读器通常会在插入点或任何虚拟光标位置读取完整的单词、句子或整个段落。These steps are necessary since it is common for a screen reader to read out a full word, sentence, or entire paragraph at the insertion point or any virtual cursor position. 同时考虑隐藏文本和可见文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. 如果控件不支持给定的，则应遵从下一个受支持的最大 值。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 下面列出了从最小单位到最大单位的顺序。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - -

param.name: attribute
param.span: 文本特性。

summary.span: 检索整个文本范围内指定特性的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value of the specified attribute across the text range.

returns.span: 检索一个表示指定特性的值的对象。

span.span: Retrieves an object representing the value of the specified attribute.

returns.span: 例如，GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute) 将返回一个表示文本范围的字体名称的字符串，而 GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute) 将返回一个类型 的值。

span.span: For example, GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.FontNameAttribute) would return a string that represents the font name of the text range while GetAttributeValue(TextPattern.IsItalicAttribute) would return a value of type .

returns.span: 如果指定特性的值在文本范围内会发生变化，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the value of the specified attribute varies over the text range.

returns.span: 如果提供程序或控件不支持指定的特性，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the specified attribute is not supported by the provider or the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏文本和可见文本之间没有区别。There is no differentiation between hidden and visible text.

span.span: If the specified attribute is not valid.

returns.span: 文本范围中每个完全或部分可见的文本行的边框组成的数组。

span.span: An array of bounding rectangles for each full or partial line of text in a text range.

returns.span: 对于退化范围，则为一个空数组。

span.span: An empty array for a degenerate range.

returns.span: 对于其屏幕坐标完全位于屏幕之外的文本范围、滚动到视图之外的文本范围或者被某个重叠窗口遮盖住的文本范围，为一个空数组。

span.span: An empty array for a text range that has screen coordinates placing it completely off-screen, scrolled out of view, or obscured by an overlapping window.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetChildren() cil managed

summary.span: 检索文本范围内的所有嵌入对象的集合。

span.span: Retrieves a collection of all embedded objects that fall within the text range.

returns.span: 文本范围内的子对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of child objects that fall within the range.

returns.span: 与文本范围发生重叠但是并未完全包括在文本范围内的子对象也会包括在该集合中。

span.span: Children that overlap with the text range but are not entirely enclosed by it will also be included in the collection.

returns.span: 如果不存在任何子对象，则返回一个空集合。

span.span: Returns an empty collection if there are no child objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple GetEnclosingElement() cil managed

summary.span: 返回包含该文本范围的最内层控件。

span.span: Returns the innermost control that encloses the text range.

returns.span: 包含控件，通常是提供该文本范围的文本提供程序。

span.span: The enclosing control, typically the text provider that supplies the text range.

returns.span: 但是，如果文本提供程序支持表格或超链接这样的子元素，那么包含元素可能为文本提供程序的子代。

span.span: However, if the text provider supports child elements such as tables or hyperlinks, then the enclosing element could be a descendant of the text provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetText(int32 maxLength) cil managed
Public Function GetText (maxLength As Integer) As String

param.name: maxLength
param.span: 要返回的字符串的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of the string to return.

param.span: 如果没有任何限制，则使用 -1。

span.span: Use -1 if no limit is required.

summary.span: 检索文本范围的纯文本。

span.span: Retrieves the plain text of the range.

returns.span: 文本范围的纯文本（可能在指定 处截断）。

span.span: The plain text of the text range, possibly truncated at the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时考虑隐藏文本和可见文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. 如果 `maxLength` 大于调用方的文本跨度长度，则返回的字符串将是文本范围的纯文本。If `maxLength` is greater than the length of the text span of the caller, the string returned will be the plain text of the text range. 不会受到文本流中的终结点顺序的影响;它将始终按逻辑文本流顺序返回文本范围起点和终点之间的文本。 will not be affected by the order of endpoints in the text flow; it will always return the text between the Start and End endpoints of the text range in the logical text flow order.

span.span: If is less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Move (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int count);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Move(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function Move (unit As TextUnit, count As Integer) As Integer
abstract member Move : System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit * int -> int

param.name: unit
param.span: 文本单位的边界。

span.span: The text unit boundary.

param.name: count
param.span: 要移动的文本单位数。

span.span: The number of text units to move.

param.span: 正值表示将文本范围向前移动，负值则表示向后移动文本范围，如果为 0，则不会进行任何移动。

span.span: A positive value moves the text range forward, a negative value moves the text range backward, and 0 has no effect.

summary.span: 将文本范围移动指定数量的文本单位。

span.span: Moves the text range the specified number of text units.

returns.span: 实际移动的单位数。

span.span: The number of units actually moved.

returns.span: 如果新的文本范围端点大于或小于 端点，则它可能小于请求移动的单位数。

span.span: This can be less than the number requested if either of the new text range endpoints is greater than or less than the endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要遍历文本范围的内容，为使 方法成功执行，将在后台进行一系列步骤。When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 对文本范围进行了规范化。也就是说，已在 终结点将文本范围折叠为退化范围，这使得 终结点成为多余。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 在文本范围跨越边界的情况下，此步骤是必需的 `unit` ; 例如，"{The U} RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) 嵌入文本"，其中 "{" 和 "}" 是文本范围的终结点。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 生成的范围在 中向后移动到所请求的 `unit` 边界的开头。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 范围在 中向前或向后移动所请求的 `unit` 边界的数目。The range is moved forward or backward in the by the requested number of `unit` boundaries. 4. 然后通过将 终结点移动一个所请求的 `unit` 边界，范围从退化范围状态扩展开来。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![范围调整（通过移动 & ExpandToEnclosingUnit）](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "通过 Move 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit 进行的范围调整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何针对 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 调整文本范围的示例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 文本容器和嵌入对象（如超链接或表格单元格）的文本内容（或内部文本）在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 树的控件视图和内容视图中作为单个连续文本流公开，对象边界被忽略。The textual content (or inner text) of a text container and an embedded object, such as a hyperlink or table cell, is exposed as a single, continuous text stream in both the control view and the content view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree; object boundaries are ignored. ![嵌入式对象所跨的文本范围。](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "嵌入式对象所跨的文本范围。")![Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-embeddedobjecttextranges.png "Text ranges spanned by embedded objects.") 含有嵌入对象及其范围跨度的文本流示例Example of a text stream with embedded objects and their range spans 同时考虑隐藏文本和可见文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. 如果控件不支持给定的，则应遵从下一个受支持的最大 值。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 下面列出了从最小单位到最大单位的顺序。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - - 不会以任何方式更改文本，该文本范围只会跨越不同的文本部分。The text is not altered in any way, the text range just spans a different part of the text.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MoveEndpointByRange (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider targetRange, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MoveEndpointByRange(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextRangeProvider targetRange, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint targetEndpoint) cil managed
Public Sub MoveEndpointByRange (endpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint, targetRange As ITextRangeProvider, targetEndpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint)

param.name: endpoint
param.span: 要移动的端点。

span.span: The endpoint to move.

param.name: targetRange
param.span: 同一文本提供程序中的另一个范围。

span.span: Another range from the same text provider.

param.name: targetEndpoint
param.span: 另一个范围中的端点。

span.span: An endpoint on the other range.

summary.span: 将文本范围的一个端点移动到第二个文本范围的指定端点。

span.span: Moves one endpoint of a text range to the specified endpoint of a second text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要移动的终结点越过同一文本范围的其他终结点，则还会移动其他终结点，从而导致退化范围，并确保终结点的正确顺序 (即， 始终小于或等于 ) 。If the endpoint being moved crosses the other endpoint of the same text range then that other endpoint is moved also, resulting in a degenerate range and ensuring the correct ordering of the endpoints (that is, is always less than or equal to ).

MemberSignature.Value: public int MoveEndpointByUnit (System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int count);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 MoveEndpointByUnit(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit unit, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function MoveEndpointByUnit (endpoint As TextPatternRangeEndpoint, unit As TextUnit, count As Integer) As Integer
public: int MoveEndpointByUnit(System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextPatternRangeEndpoint endpoint, System::Windows::Automation::Text::TextUnit unit, int count);
abstract member MoveEndpointByUnit : System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRangeEndpoint * System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextUnit * int -> int

param.name: endpoint
param.span: 要移动的端点。

span.span: The endpoint to move.

param.name: unit
param.span: 移动时使用的文本单位。

span.span: The textual unit for moving.

param.name: count
param.span: 要移动的单元的数量。

span.span: The number of units to move.

param.span: 正值表示向前移动端点。

span.span: A positive value moves the endpoint forward.

param.span: 负值表示向后移动端点。

span.span: A negative value moves backward.

param.span: 0 值表示不做任何移动。

span.span: A value of 0 has no effect.

summary.span: 在文档范围内将文本范围的一个端点移动指定数量的文本单位。

span.span: Moves one endpoint of the text range the specified number of text units within the document range.

returns.span: 实际移动的单位数，如果移动端点时遇到了文档的开始或结尾，则可能小于请求移动的单位数。

span.span: The number of units actually moved, which can be less than the number requested if moving the endpoint runs into the beginning or end of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要遍历文本范围的内容，为使 方法成功执行，将在后台进行一系列步骤。When it is necessary to traverse the content of a text range, a series of steps are involved behind the scenes in order for the method to execute successfully. 1. 对文本范围进行了规范化。也就是说，已在 终结点将文本范围折叠为退化范围，这使得 终结点成为多余。The text range is normalized; that is, the text range is collapsed to a degenerate range at the endpoint, which makes the endpoint superfluous. 在文本范围跨越边界的情况下，此步骤是必需的 `unit` ; 例如，"{The U} RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) 嵌入文本"，其中 "{" 和 "}" 是文本范围的终结点。This step is necessary to remove ambiguity in situations where a text range spans `unit` boundaries; for example, "{The U}RL [https://www.microsoft.com/](https://www.microsoft.com/) is embedded in text" where "{" and "}" are the text range endpoints. 2. 生成的范围在 中向后移动到所请求的 `unit` 边界的开头。The resulting range is moved backward in the to the beginning of the requested `unit` boundary. 3. 然后通过将 终结点移动一个所请求的 `unit` 边界，范围从退化范围状态扩展开来。The range is then expanded from a degenerate range state by moving the endpoint by one requested `unit` boundary. ![范围调整（通过移动 & ExpandToEnclosingUnit）](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "通过 Move 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit 进行的范围调整")![Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit](~/add/media/uia-textpattern-moveandexpand-examples.png "Range adjustments by Move & ExpandToEnclosingUnit") 如何针对 Move() 和 ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 调整文本范围的示例Examples of how a text range is adjusted for Move() and ExpandToEnclosingUnit() 如果控件不支持给定的，则应遵从下一个受支持的最大 值。 defers to the next largest supported if the given is not supported by the control. 下面列出了从最小单位到最大单位的顺序。The order, from smallest unit to largest, is listed below. - - - - - - -

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveFromSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 从支持多个不连续文本选择的文本容器中的突出显示文本集合中，删除与调用方的 和 端点对应的突出显示文本部分。

span.span: Removes a highlighted section of text, corresponding to the caller's and endpoints, from the collection of highlighted text in a text container that supports multiple, disjoint selections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本插入点将移到已删除突出显示的区域。The text insertion point will move to the area of the removed highlight. 提供一个退化文本范围将移动插入点。Providing a degenerate text range will move the insertion point.

exception.span: 如果文本提供程序不支持选择多个不连续的文本范围（例如， 的值必须为 ）。

span.span: If text provider does not support multiple, disjoint selections (for example, must have a value of ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ScrollIntoView(bool alignToTop) cil managed

param.name: alignToTop
param.span: 如果文本控件应该滚动以便文本范围与视区顶部对齐，则为 ；如果应该与视区底部对齐，则为 。

span.span: if the text control should be scrolled so the text range is flush with the top of the viewport; if it should be flush with the bottom of the viewport.

summary.span: 导致文本控件垂直滚动，直到文本范围在视区中可见。

span.span: Causes the text control to scroll vertically until the text range is visible in the viewport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时考虑隐藏文本和可见文本。 respects both hidden and visible text. 如果文本范围处于隐藏状态，则仅当隐藏文本在视区中具有定位点时，文本控件才会滚动。If the text range is hidden, the text control will scroll only if the hidden text has an anchor in the viewport.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Select() cil managed

summary.span: 突出显示文本控件中与文本范围的 和 端点对应的文本。

span.span: Highlights text in the text control corresponding to the text range and endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供了退化文本范围，文本插入点将移到 文本范围的终结点。If a degenerate text range is provided, the text insertion point will move to the endpoint of the text range.

exception.span: 在文本控件不支持文本选择时发生。

span.span: Occurs when text selection is not supported by the text control.
